header.gameNote: ATHLETES IN ACTION BASKETBALL CLASSIC AT SEATTLE WA

article.headline: Wright St. 82, Belmont 73
article.story: SEATTLE -- Todd Brown scored 14 of his 25 points in the first half, Troy Tabler added 16 and Wright State used a big first half to run past Belmont 82-73 on Sunday night on the final day of the round-robin Athletes in Action Classic. Brown scored 12 points during a decisive first-half run that put the Raiders up by as many as 20. Cory Cooperwood's jumper started a 26-7 spurt that built Wright State's lead to 40-20 late in the half. The Raiders (2-1) shot nearly 60 percent in the first half and 57 percent in the game. While Wright State built its lead, Belmont went more than 7 minutes without scoring. The Bruins came back in the second half but couldn't get closer than the final score. Mick Hedgepeth led Belmont (1-2) with 19 points and Scott Sanders added 10.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
